attributes.action: For outlying rural areas of "zoned for housing" villages, maintain proportional development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There appears to be a severe "cramming in" of hoses into zoned sites which result in overcrowded looking estates.  Not everyone wishes to live in an estate and virtually no consideration is given to a sensible increase in housing on the outskirts of villages etc (RURAL AREAS)- apply a ratio (say 25:1) of new build housing in a zoned area to its surrounding outlying area
